body:
Abraham,



Thank you for the input.  I have updated the chart such that you now only get one data set out if you connect up a windSpeed list that aligns with the temperature lists.  You still get two comfort polygons generated for the max and min of the windSpeed dataset.  You can see this in the attached file.

I will update the psychrometric chart to behave similarly in the future:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/247](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/247)



Thanks again for all of the suggestions,

-Chris
